recipe.title: Black-Tie Martinis
ingredients: 9 ounces (1 cup plus 2 tablespoon) gin or vodka
instructions: Combine gin and peppercorns, then let stand 15 minutes.

Stir together 1/2 teaspoon finely ground pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt on a plate. Wet rim of 1 Martini glass with your fingertip and dip in salt mixture, rotating glass to coat rim. Repeat with 2 more glasses.
Strain gin through a fine-mesh sieve into a 16-ounce cocktail shaker three-fourths full of ice. Add vermouth and bitters and stir 15 seconds. Strain into Martini glasses.
